info.title: Customer Onboarding At RAK Bank
info.description: A typical customer onboarding process involves multiple activities. It starts with evaluating the customer's requirement, followed by due-diligence, completion of legal aspects, account opening and making it operational.  Note - When DEH/Oauth services are down , no response will be sent from DEH. - Response for OTP will have only the mode rest will be null
